statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_name, reach FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE conversions < 5 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, reach, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE reach > 500 AND clicks < 200;
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE reach BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE reach > 100 AND clicks > 50 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE conversions BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY reach ASC, clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks < 50 OR reach < 200 ORDER BY clicks ASC, reach DESC
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks <> 0 ORDER BY reach DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, reach, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE reach = 150 AND conversions > 5 ORDER BY campaign_name
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_id, reach, clicks FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM CampaignDetails ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, reach, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE reach > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM CampaignDetails WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY reach DESC, clicks ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM CampaignDetails WHERE end_date > '2022-08-01'
SELECT campaign_id, reach, clicks, conversions FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE reach BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY campaign_id
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM CampaignDetails WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Holiday%'
SELECT * FROM CampaignPerformance WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversions < 10 ORDER BY conversions DESC
SELECT * FROM Reach
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, date FROM Reach ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT clicks FROM Clicks WHERE campaign_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Conversions WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM Conversions GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_conversions DESC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM Reach GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, date, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM Clicks WHERE date = '2022-01-01' GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_id, c.date AS click_date, cc.date AS conversion_date, SUM(c.clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(cc.conversions) AS total_conversions FROM Clicks c JOIN Conversions cc ON c.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_id, c.date, cc.date;

SELECT r.campaign_id, r.date AS reach_date, SUM(r.impressions) AS total_impressions, c.date AS click_date, SUM(c.clicks) AS total_clicks, cc.date AS conversion_date, SUM(cc.conversions) AS total_conversions FROM Reach r JOIN Clicks c ON r.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN Conversions cc ON r.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id GROUP BY r.campaign_id, r.date, c.date, cc.date;

SELECT c.campaign_id, r.date AS reach_date, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM Reach r JOIN Clicks c ON r.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN Conversions cc ON r.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id WHERE r.date = '2022-01-01' AND c.date = '2022-01-01' AND cc.date = '2022-01-01' GROUP BY c.campaign_id, r.date;
SELECT * FROM reach WHERE reach_id = 1
SELECT date, impressions FROM reach ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT source, clicks FROM clicks WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT date, source, conversions FROM conversions WHERE source = 'Google'
SELECT reach_id, date FROM reach JOIN campaign_performance ON reach.reach_id = campaign_performance.reach_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM reach WHERE reach_id < 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, impressions, clicks FROM reach WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT source, SUM(clicks) AS 'total_clicks' FROM clicks GROUP BY source HAVING total_clicks > 100
SELECT date, source, conversions FROM conversions WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY conversions DESC, date ASC

SELECT campaign_performance.date, reach_id, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance INNER JOIN reach ON campaign_performance.reach_id = reach.reach_id INNER JOIN clicks ON campaign_performance.click_id = clicks.click_id ORDER BY campaign_performance.date ASC
SELECT * FROM Reach LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, reach_date FROM Reach WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM Clicks GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM Campaigns JOIN Performance ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Performance.campaign_id WHERE Performance.impressions > 500;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT c.campaign_name, p.impressions, p.clicks, p.conversions FROM Campaigns c JOIN Performance p ON c.campaign_id = p.campaign_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, p.impressions, p.clicks FROM Campaigns c JOIN Performance p ON c.campaign_id = p.campaign_id WHERE p.impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM Performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
